content.rendered:
[blank_spacer height=”65px” width=”1/1″ el_position=”first last”] [spb_text_block title=”Who we are” pb_margin_bottom=”no” pb_border_bottom=”no” width=”1/3″ el_position=”first”]

Since 1977, ATC Automation & Robotics has been providing custom assembly automation and test systems for a variety of industries, including the medical device, consumer product and automotive sectors. ATC Automation & Robotics applies a wide range of assembly technologies and engineered solutions in all facets of discrete part assembly.

Relying on a diverse and experienced team of professionals, ATC provides complete turnkey design-build services for their customers. Each project is assigned to a cross-functional team consisting of a project manager, mechanical & electrical designers, controls engineers, machinists and assemblers. From start to finish, the team works as an extension of the clients manufacturing operation to insure that specifications and schedules are met.

[/spb_text_block] [spb_accordion widget_title=”More about us” width=”1/3″] [spb_accordion_tab title=”Technologies” accordion_id=”” icon=””] [spb_text_block pb_margin_bottom=”no” pb_border_bottom=”no” width=”1/1″ el_position=”first last”]
  • Functional & Leak Testing
  • Lean Manufacturing
  • Manual Work Cells
  • Robotic Assembly
  • Rotary Dial Indexers
  • Synchronous & Non-Synchronous Conveyor
[/spb_text_block] [/spb_accordion_tab] [spb_accordion_tab title=”Major Markets Served ” accordion_id=”” icon=””] [spb_text_block pb_margin_bottom=”no” pb_border_bottom=”no” width=”1/1″ el_position=”first last”]
  • Aerospace
  • Automotive
  • Medical Device
  • Life Science
  • Energy Storage
  • General Industrial
  • Consumer Products
[/spb_text_block] [/spb_accordion_tab] [spb_accordion_tab title=”Contact” accordion_id=”” icon=””] [spb_text_block pb_margin_bottom=”no” pb_border_bottom=”no” width=”1/1″ el_position=”first last”]

ATC Automation & Robotics

101 Mill Drive
Cookeville, TN 38501

Phone: +1 931-528-5417
www.atcautomation.com
